body.name: 2024 Tablet 10 inch Android 13 Tablets with Octa-Core, 14GB RAM 128GB ROM, 8000mAh Battery, Drop-Proof Case, TF 512GB, HD IPS Touchscreen, 5G/2.4G WiFi, Bluetooth 5.0, GPS, Split Screen Support -Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 4 mins
features: 【 2024 Newest Octa-Core Processor 】X500 Tablet is equipped with the latest Android 13 OS, get rid of unexpected ads. Built-in 2.0Ghz octa-core CPU and 14GB (8+6 Virtual) RAM provide fast application launch and smooth gaming experience. 8000mAh battery supports hours of browsing, watching movies, playing games, listening to music. Split screen feature allows you to take notes and watch videos at the same time. The powerful performance makes it the perfect gift for both adults and kids.

【 14(8+6)GB RAM and Large Storage 】The AOCWEI X500 tablet pc has 14GB ( 8GB Physical + Expanded 6GB Virtual ) RAM and 128GB ROM internal storage. Supports up to 512GB memory micro SD card ( not included ). Which makes it can stores a large number of e-books, movies, photos, games and more. It is Google GMS certificated, you can download any needed APPS from Google Play Store, such as Netflix, Facebook, Twitter, etc.

【 360° Rotating EVA Protective Case 】The Shockproof Case of X500 Tablet is made of premium environmentally friendly EVA material, providing perfect protection against accidental drops, scratches, shocks and dust, helping keep your tablet as beautiful as the day you take it out of the box. 360° Rotatable foldable stand offers multiple angles for enjoying the most comfortable typing and movie-viewing.

【 10.1 inch HD Display and Large Battery 】The Android Tablet featuring with a wide and stunning 800*1280 IPS display, which presents a bright display with more abundant colors and more delicate picture quality from all angles. Comes with a 3-layer screen protector which prevent screen scratches. The front 5MP and rear 8MP cameras can easily satisfy video calls, online learning, etc. Equipped with 8000mAh large capacity battery for long time use and longer standby time.

【 Parent Control & Other Function 】The android tablet preinstalls a kid's app Google Kids Space. Parent can easily manage the tablet via Google Family Link such as APP access rights, usage time limit, location, etc. The Tablet also support GPS, wireless casting, eye protection mode, printing, Bluetooth 5.0 connection, etc. It's perfect gift for family, friends, lover, kids, etc.
body.description: 2024 Newest X500 10.1 inch Tablet, Android 13 OS, 14(8+6)GB RAM, 128GB ROM, 512 GB Expanded Micoro SD Card memory, GMS Certified, 1280x800 IPS Display, 5g/2.4g WiFi Tablet, with No Smell Drop-proof EVA Case Specification: OS: Android 13 without Ads CPU: Octa-Core, 2.0GHZ RAM: 14GB ( 8GB Physical + 6GB Virtual ) ROM: 128GB Storage External Storage：Support up to 512GB Micro SD Card ( Not inluded ) Connection: 2.4Ghz + 5Ghz WiFi, Bluetooth 5.0, Hotspot, FM Resolution: 1280*800 support 1080p video playback Hardware Configuration: Screen Size: 10.1 inch Interfaces: Type C port, Micro SD Card slot, Earphone port, Mic supported Camera: 5MP Front and 8MP Rear Battery: 8000mAh Age Range Description: 2+ years old Package includes: 1. 10.1 inch Tablet with Case 2. Premium EVA protective Case 3. Charging Adapter with Type C Cable 4. 3-layer Screen Protector 5. Well-designed Box 6. User Manual After-sales Service: AOCWEI has a professional service team to deal with all kinds of problems. If you have any problem please feel free to send us Amazon Message, we will reply within 24 hours and give you satisfactory solutions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Tablet for Kids and all the power needed for their gaming needs
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the AOCWEI MODEL X500, which exceeded my expectations. Here's a quick rundown of my experience:Pros:Performance:The AOCWEI MODEL X500 performs exceptionally well, efficiently handling my kid's gaming needs. The impressive processing speed makes it a reliable companion for all my kid's gaming and other Android apps.Design:I appreciate the Aocwei's sleek and modern design. It's lightweight and portable, making it easy to carry around for traveling and long commuting rides.Battery Life:The battery life is impressive, lasting 7 hours on a single charge. This makes it suitable for long flights or extended gaming sessions without worrying about running out of power.The new tablet has proven reliable and efficient in my kid's eyes compared to their old Amazon Kindle. It balances performance/portability/features and offers excellent value for the price.If you're in the market for a great tablet, give the Aocwei X500 a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the AOCWEI X500 tablet for myself, I am someone who is special needs. I have autism. I decided to go with the one with a pink case.So, the AOCWEI X500 tablet is a budget-friendly option that punches above other tablets I have had in the past.At first glance, I was shocked by the power and features it offers for the cost. The X500 has a 10.1" HD touchscreen display with vibrant colors and good viewing angles.By the way, the screen looked bigger than I expected. That caught me by surprise but I was also excited about it.The screen is crisp and responsive to touch. Browsing websites is a pleasure on this large display. The tablet is also sleek and lightweight at only 1.3 pounds, making it very portable.The tablet is powered by an octa-core processor and 4GB of RAM, providing snappy performance for daily activities like email, social media, streaming videos and light gaming.Even with multiple apps open, I didn't experience any lag or stutters. The 32GB of internal storage is also generous for the price point.Battery life is excellent - the 8000mAh battery easily lasts all day with moderate to heavy use. I was able to binge watch films for hours without needing to recharge.The tablet also comes with a fast charger to top it up quickly when needed.At its low price tag, I was surprised by how well-rounded the AOCWEI X500 tablet is. It delivers smooth performance, long battery life and an excellent screen - everything you need for entertainment, productivity and connectivity on a budget.If you're looking for an affordable, full-featured tablet, this one deserves consideration. I would choose this over any other tablet I had before. This is definitely the best one I have had-hands down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A bargain for the price
reviews.reviewText: This tablet far exceeds my original expectations. It's performance is excellent, quick and easy to navigate through. It automatically clears added cache upon closing an app. The battery has lasted me a full day. And vdeo quality is razor sharp. Certainly takes no back seat to my other tablet by a well known manufacturer which costs twice as much. And this one includes a pre-installed case similar to one I had to pay approximately $25 for (the case itself is very rugged, sturdy and comfortable to hold).The AOCWEI X500 deserves the praise it received from other users. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great tablet, but needs software help
reviews.reviewText: So the tablet itself is huge- for the price, I expected a much lower quality screen. It's high definition and very responsive. The included case is pretty tough and it should keep the thing safe despite my kids attempts to neglect it.My only gripe here is the software- it claims to be running android 14 but a lot of software doesn't work properly due to firmware issues, and all my troubleshooting points to this being an older version of android.Hey guys- send me out an OS build that will play the kid's Budge games and I'll up this to 5 stars. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the Tablet you Want
reviews.reviewText: This tablet is excellent. It is responsive...easy to set up and all around great tablet. I have been looking for a GOOD tablet at a reasonable price...this is the one! Good audio, great picture quality. Excellent speed and storage. Very happy with my purchase and would strongly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The AOCWEI tablet is definitely a great purchase for younger kids. I purchased two of them as a Christmas gift to my 4 and 6 year old children. They absolutely love it! The tablets have proved to be very easy to use. I am very please with the parental control, good quality, and protective case. Also, I love the fact customer service responds to your emails very quickly and works to resolve any issues. I would definitely recommend to a friend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As good as an expensive brand name tablet.
reviews.reviewText: The screen has nice bright glossy colors!, like the expensive tablets. You can see the screen very well from the sides, even at steep angles, and the touch screen is very responsive.The sound is clear and it can be quite loud if needed. The battery lasts a long time. The wifi connectivity is very reliable, no issues. One great thing with the tablet is that it has 8gb of Ram!, which makes it fast and very responsive. Honest, this tablet is as good as the expensive tablets. There are no compromises here.I recommend removing the screen protectors that comes preinstalled, the screen looks better and you don't really need it.
